## Introduction

The `dlme` package enhances `dlm` by providing extra functionality
aimed at simplifying the usage of the `dlm` package.


```{r}
library(dlmextra)
```

## Filtering and forecasting

The `dlm::dlmForecast` function does not work with non-constant models, i.e. models where $F$, $G$, $V$ or $W$ are vary with time.
